Rui Bai http://yihui.name 2014-07-29T17:29:12-07:00 xie@yihui.name Trip to Glacier /2014/07/photos-from-glacier/ 2014-07-28T00:00:00-07:00 Rui Bai /2014/07/photos-from-glacier Last week I went on a 5-day camping trip at Glacier National Park in Montana. Before I went I had high expectations and therefore secretly thought that I'll be disappointed. Man was I wrong. Everywhere we hiked to, every direction we looked, the scene is simply unreal. Here are a few photos, and I hope you enjoy.
